headline: EDWARDS EXTERNAL OIL FILTERING SYSTEM
description: External Oil Filtering System    Designed for use with the following pumps:  E1M18/E2M18, E1M40/E2M40, E1M80/E2M80,   E1M175/E2M175, and E1M275/E2M275.
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Vacuum Pump Accessories
specstable:
Manufacturer Edwards
Model EOF40CR
Description External Oil Filtering System
Accessories Unit comes with stainless steel braided hoses with 2 pairs of ss disconnects
Other Information 1/6 HP pump (1425 rpm)
Pump flow rate: 4.2 l/m
Current: 5A (start), 2.5A (run)
Optional Pressure Switch NOT included
Condition Very Good
Exterior Dimensions
Width 12.000 in (30.5 cm)
Depth 10.000 in (25.4 cm)
Height 12.000 in (30.5 cm)
Weight 60 lb (27 kg)
